'''The Beautiful and Damned''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned upon completing ''[[The Grave of the Guarded]]''.

==Trivia==
* The name is a reference to the novel ''{{w|The Beautiful and Damned}}'' by {{w|F. Scott Fitzgerald}}.
